traits.name: Deer Lord
traits.desc: Choose a target within 30 ft. of you. The target may spend its reaction to make a basic attack against a target of your choice.

traits.name: Scepter
traits.desc: Melee: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target Hit: 5 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: In my name, dispatch them !
traits.desc: Utility: range 30 ft., one ally. Effect: The target roll their next attack roll with advantage.

traits.name: With Haste !
traits.desc: Utility: range 30 ft., two allies. Effect: Your ally may reduce the cooldown of any one feature by 1 or reroll a recharge feature.
